questions.text: Which child is only ten years old?
questions.explanation:
Violet.

	Violet's favorite color is purple.

questions.text: In what book did the children visit a place called "Snowflake Inn"?
questions.explanation:
"The Mystery of Snowflake Inn".

	The children made new friends in this book. The new friends are Hannah and Davey Miller.

questions.text: In what book does Violet find a volume of fairy tales?
questions.explanation:
"The Mystery Bookstore".

	Other people wanted that volume also.

questions.text: In what book do the kids meet someone named Jane Driver?
questions.explanation:
"The Mystery in the Computer Game".

	The kids really like the computer game.

questions.text: In what book do the kids FIRST meet Watch?
questions.explanation:
"The Boxcar Children".

	This is the first book of the series.  The kids meet Watch in the woods.

questions.text: In what book does the boxcar get stolen?
questions.explanation:
"The Mystery of the Stolen Boxcar".

	They eventually get it back.

questions.text: In what book do the kids meet a clown?
questions.explanation:
"The Caboose Mystery".

	The kids live in a caboose.

questions.text: In what book do the kids meet someone named Mrs. Winkles?
questions.explanation:
"The Candy Factory Mystery".

	The kids learn how to make candy.  Mrs. Winkles is a friend of their Grandfather's.
